data.actual_result: You return to the channel, but the message menu is open, as is the keyboard
data.expected_result: You should be taken back to the channel with the message menu closed and keyboard not open
data.short_description: Holding down on a message and clicking add reaction and adding a global emoji in a server with External Emojis disabled causes the keyboard to stay open when the toast pops up "Unknown Emoji"
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold down on a message - Click "Add Reaction" - Ensure that the owner (or moderator) has External Emojis disabled.  - Attempt to add a global emoji from an outside server (nitro is NOT required) - Do not tap anything on the screen after you have clicked an emote - Observe
